nameJa: 第11回 伊豆大島マラソン
report: First marathon, hotter than expected, overdressed in a grid-fleece on a sunny 15C day, went way too hard at the end trying to finish under 5h30m and learned the hard way what exercise-induced hypoxemia feels like (i.e. losing sensation in limbs and face while laying on the ground for 30 minutes thinking you're gonna die)
